verses.verse: If you will return<WH7725>, O Israel<WH3478>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, return<WH7725> unto me<WH5493>: and if you will put away your abominations<WH8251> out of my sight<WH6440>, then shall you not be removed<WH5110>.
